name: Lost in Sirenheads Forest 2.0 Christmas EDITION
name_original: Lost in Sirenheads Forest 2.0 Christmas EDITION
description:
The goal is to find the keys to unlock the door in the bedroom one key spawns at a time when you go in the bedroom. But the door to the bedroom only opens when you pick a key up. avoiding Sirenhead or you can kill it temporarily. There is a shotgun and a alarm clock to distract and power ups I hope that I summed up good enough i hope you enjoy the game

this game does not follow the lore of Sirenhead.
